amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that nothing in the bill shall affect the right to bear arms under the Second Amendment to the Constitution of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-621 to clarifie that nothing in this Act shall affect the right to bear arms under the Second Amendment to the Constitution of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mahoney (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
